TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Um controle do Windows Forms que pode ser usado para hospedar um elemento do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use o controle para colocar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] em seu [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controle ou formulário.Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, use o elemento.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration é instalado com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. O local padrão para o assembly é %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. Para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento em um formulário do Windows, você deve atribuir o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento para o propriedade.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. Use o propriedade para atribuir mapeamentos personalizados entre um controle e seu hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o controle para hospedar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle composto do WPF 3D em Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AutoSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle é redimensionado automaticamente para exibir todo o seu conteúdo.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: Se o controle ajustará seu tamanho em conjunto para seu conteúdo. Caso contrário, .

span.span: if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BackColorTransparent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define um valor indicando se o elemento hospedado contém uma tela de fundo transparente.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: Se o elemento hospedado contém um plano de fundo transparente; Caso contrário, .

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O propriedade permite a cópia de bitmap, o que permite hospedado elementos para usar transparência sobre o contêiner host.The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. Isso é útil quando o elemento está sobre uma imagem ou uma cor de fundo.This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. Por motivos de desempenho, o propriedade está desativada por padrão.For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::UIElement ^ Child { System::Windows::UIElement ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::UIElement ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define o hospedado pelo controle .

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Somente um elemento pode ser hospedado, mas pode ter qualquer número de elementos filho.Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o propriedade para atribuir um hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obter mais informações, consulte [passo a passo: hospedando um controle composto do WPF 3D em Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Libera imediatamente quaisquer recursos do sistema usados pelo controle .

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método .This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`. invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este referências.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: Ao substituir cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para .

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar , consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: Para obter mais informações sobre e , consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: A janela [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] a ser aberta de modo sem janela restrita.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Habilita um a receber as mensagens do teclado corretamente quando ele é aberto de modo sem janela restrita de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chamar o método para encaminhar todas as mensagens do teclado quando uma [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] janela é aberta em modo sem restrição.Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. O método instalará um filtro de mensagem no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicativo com base em.The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. O filtro encaminha todas as mensagens do teclado quando a janela sem janela restrita está ativa.The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostContainer As Panel
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ HostContainer { System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o contêiner pai do elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O contêiner host é o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , que é o contêiner pai para o elemento hospedado.The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. O contêiner host sempre é a raiz do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] hierarquia de elementos.The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. Para acessar o pai do elemento hospedado, acessar diretamente.To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

summary.span: Garante que todas as mensagens importantes de WM_CHAR são encaminhadas para o elemento hospedado.

span.span: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] não processar o elemento `charCode`, o controle processa-o com o método.If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the control processes it with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnabledChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnabledChanged (e As EventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: Os dados do evento.

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: Aciona o evento .

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). O método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: Ao substituir em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O implementação o método encaminha para a implementação da classe base.The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

para.span: Não substitua esta implementação do método.

span.span: Do not override this implementation of the method.

para.span: O gerencia o controle de pintura do seu elemento hospedado e substituindo causará resultados imprevisíveis.

span.span: The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPaintBackground(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs pevent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnPaintBackground (pevent As PaintEventArgs)

param.name: pevent
param.span: Um que contém informações sobre o controle de pintura.

span.span: A that contains information about the control to paint.

summary.span: Colore a tela de fundo do controle.

span.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método pinta o plano de fundo do controle pai em um HBITMAP fora da tela.The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. Esse bitmap é usado como plano de fundo do elemento hospedado para dar suporte a transparência.This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. Este método oferece suporte à [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usada diretamente no seu código.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: Um , passado por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela a ser processada.

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: Um dos valores que representam a chave a ser processada.

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: Processa uma chave de comando, garantindo que o elemento hospedado tenha oportunidade para manipular o comando antes do processamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normal.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: se o caractere for uma tecla de atalho [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], caso contrário, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se uma mensagem de chave não é manipulada pelo hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, ele é encaminhado para cima o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] classe hierarquia para processamento.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: para confiança total do chamador imediato.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Protected Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean

param.name: charCode
param.span: O caractere a ser processado.

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: Processa um caractere mnemônico, garantindo que o elemento hospedado tenha uma oportunidade de manipular o mnemônico antes do processamento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normal.

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: se o caractere for uma tecla de atalho [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], caso contrário, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se uma mensagem de chave não é manipulada pelo hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, ele é encaminhado para cima o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] classe hierarquia para processamento.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: para confiança total do chamador imediato.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Este membro não pode ser usado pelo código parcialmente confiável.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Obtém o mapa de propriedade, que determina como configurar as propriedades no controle afeta o elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: Um que mapeia a propriedades em hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As tecnologias [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] têm dois modelos de propriedade semelhantes, mas diferentes.The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *Mapeamento de propriedade* dá suporte à interoperação entre as duas arquiteturas.*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. Para mais informações, consulte [Windows Forms e mapeamento de propriedade do WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o propriedade traduzir o propriedade hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para mais informações, consulte [Instruções passo a passo: mapeando propriedades usando o controle ElementHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: para especificar a direção do controle a ser selecionado; caso contrário, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: para avançar na ordem de tabulação; para voltar na ordem de tabulação.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Ativa o elemento hospedado.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método ativa o elemento hospedado.The method activates the hosted element. Se houver mais de um elemento hospedado, o elemento primeiro ou último é ativado, dependendo do `directed` e `forward` parâmetros.If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. Repetidas chamadas para o método não atravessa os elementos hospedados.Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. Para selecionar elementos subsequentes, chame o método o propriedade.To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. Essa implementação encaminha as chaves de guia de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
